comment: Kind professor and very easy class. She gives students a lot of grace if they have a good excuse as to why something is turned in late, etc. Her instructions on assignments can be a little vague and it does seem like she doesn't really know what she's talking about. But she is a very sweet lady who loves her students. Thats more than most teachers.

Looks like she never worked construction in her life yet she teaches it. Such a critique grader and makes the assignments difficult for no reason. She goes based on the powerpoints and she has a hard time connecting it to real-world examples. Looks like she's just winging it when it comes to teaching.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Love her online class. It was very easy to follow. Literally an easy A if you do all of her assignments on time PLUS she is really big on the extra credit. I would take this class again!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Stephens is passionate and understanding. Her D2L is easy to navigate and all course material is laid out for your success. I truly feel like I learned a lot in this class.
show up and you will be good. amazing professor
Professor Stephens is great. Her class is easy if you just come to class and engage with her.

She is a little scatterbrained, class is easy though. The 3 quizzes are open notes, homework is pretty easy if you take notes, and the semester-long project is easy (made a 100). Has several guest speakers and time in the lab to see the HVAC and plumbing stuff in person, which helps.
Not too difficult, quizzes are open note. There is a semester long project that is pretty straight forward. There is also some guest speakers every few classes. Easy to pass this class.
As long as you pay attention in class, you'll pass. Easy to follow along and she answers questions you have. Not a hard class

She was okay. I did well in the class but she gives A LOT of busy work. Once the class got moved online because of COVID we even got more busy work. Sometimes it felt as if she forgot we had other classes
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Group projects--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Again another professor who is just not a great teacher. I dont understand how this department has hired so many professors who can not teach clearly. She will help you but clear communication is lacking. Class receives open ended question, when you push for an answer she admits you are supposed to assume items are there that aren't shown on plan.

Ms. Stephens is a very nice lady. She really cares if her students do well in her class. She is a little scattered sometimes, but if you show up and do you assignments you will most likely make an A. I will take her for whatever else she teaches here in the CM department.

Really really nice lady. You will get an A if you take her. She really cares if you do well and wants to help. She can be a little disorganized sometimes so it can make it hard to do work outside of class, but she usually tries to fix that. No tests, Two quizzes, and just some in class assignments. Take her if you can!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring
